participant_1.background:
I would not be able to work as a librarian if I were blind.
my mother was a single mother.
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.
I used to be more spontaneous with my painting.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.

participant_2.background:
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
I enjoy spending my time with my two beagles, Chance and Boomer
I enjoy driving my classic car along the winding roads near my lake house.
I'm kind of a rebellious person, but I also love my dad.

content.text: Hello! Hope you are doing well. I'm a librarian and enjoy painting.
Hi! I'm doing well. I'm an online tutor and love to garden.
That's awesome. What kind of plants do you have?
I have a greenhouse full of tropical plants.
That sounds amazing. My mother was a single mother and I used to work in her greenhouse when I was younger.
That's great! I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.
That's awesome. What concert are you going to?
It's a classic rock band that I've been wanting to see for a long time.
That sounds great. I hope you have a good time.
